divs: Sighting Detailsi was waiting for my kids bus.i noticed through the car window, a star moving back and forth. we got out of the car and unbeleavable movement.my 3 kids and i watched for about 20 min. after the bus came i ran back to the house and got my wife. she is now a beleaver. we watched for about 45 min. as the sun came up it disapeared. i will be watching in the morning with camera in hand. look ssw from cooks point 45 deg. up in the sky.
Summary: Moving at impossible speed , up down all over the sky.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
